sentence: The infographic titled "UV and Your Eyes" highlights the importance and impact of UV exposure on eye health.
sentence_cn: 题为“紫外线与您的眼睛”的信息图强调了紫外线照射对眼睛健康的重要性和影响。

sentence: 1. Title and Introduction:
sentence_cn: 1. 标题与简介：

sentence: - The main title is "UV and Your Eyes."
sentence_cn: - 主标题是“紫外线和你的眼睛”。

sentence: - A subtitle states, "It's What You Can't See that Matters Most."
sentence_cn: - 副标题为“你看不到的才是最重要的。”
words: It's What You Can't See that Matters Most.

sentence: 2. Central Image:
sentence_cn: 2. 中心图像：

sentence: - There is an image of an eye with arrows indicating the entry of UV rays, illustrating how eyes are exposed to UV.
sentence_cn: - 有一张眼睛的图像，其中箭头表示紫外线的进入，说明眼睛如何暴露在紫外线下。

sentence: 3. Key Points:
sentence_cn: 3. 要点：

sentence: - UV Damage: Damage to the eyes from UV exposure is cumulative and often irreversible.
sentence_cn: - 紫外线伤害：紫外线对眼睛的伤害是累积的，而且往往是不可逆的。

sentence: - Exposure: Eyes are the only internal tissue directly exposed to UV.
sentence_cn: - 暴露：眼睛是唯一直接暴露于紫外线的内部组织。

sentence: - Public Awareness: 94% of people are unaware that UV exposure is harmful to their eyes.
sentence_cn: - 公众意识：94% 的人没有意识到紫外线照射会损害他们的眼睛。

sentence: 4. Exposure Insights:
sentence_cn: 4. 曝光洞察：

sentence: - 365 Days a Year: Your eyes are exposed to UV year-round.
sentence_cn: - 一年 365 天：您的眼睛全年都会暴露在紫外线下。

sentence: - Indirect Exposure: 40% of UV exposure occurs when not in full sunlight.
sentence_cn: - 间接暴露：40% 的紫外线暴露发生在非阳光直射的情况下。

sentence: 5. Health Information:
sentence_cn: 5. 健康信息：

sentence: - Skin Cancer: 5-10% of skin cancer cases occur on the eyelids.
sentence_cn: - 皮肤癌：5-10% 的皮肤癌病例发生在眼睑上。

sentence: - Cataracts: More than 22 million Americans aged 40 and older are affected by cataracts.
sentence_cn: - 白内障：超过 2200 万 40 岁及以上的美国人患有白内障。

sentence: - Premature Aging: 90% of visible premature aging around the eyes is due to UV damage.
sentence_cn: - 过早衰老：90% 的眼睛周围可见的过早衰老是由于紫外线伤害造成的。

sentence: 6. Prevention:
sentence_cn: 6.预防：

sentence: - Protective Eyewear: Wearing UV protective glasses, even with clear lenses, can help delay cataract onset.
sentence_cn: - 防护眼镜：佩戴紫外线防护眼镜，即使是透明镜片，也可以帮助延缓白内障的发作。

sentence: 7. Further Information:
sentence_cn: 7. 更多信息：

sentence: - A call to action for more information is provided with a website link: ESPF.com.
sentence_cn: - 呼吁采取行动获取更多信息，请访问网站链接：ESPF.com。
